short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduces twitch chat clutter, and enlarges emote-only message emotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduces Twitch chat badge clutter by showing them instead on hover, and adds emote resizing similar to Discord where messages with no text and 1-3 emotes are resized to be 2x normal size.
